content: We delivered revenue of $321 million in the first quarter of 2022, reflecting year-on-year growth of 35% and 38.2% in constant currency. We now have 31 clients with TTM revenues greater than $10 million, eight more than the first quarter of 2021, a 34.8% increase from the same time last year. For the second quarter of 2022, we expect revenues to be in the range of $328 million to $329 million, reflecting year-on-year growth at the midpoint of 26.2%, or 29.5% on a constant currency basis.
